title: Speficic Purposes
subtitle: Business
lessonDescription: Peter, Linda, and Todd work as a managers at Capital City Bank, a retail bank. Linda's creative idea for attracting new customers to the bank has generated lots of ne business.

paragraphs.speaker: Peter
paragraphs.text: Great news! We had a record-breaking quarter. We brought in revenues of $500, 000.

paragraphs.speaker: Linda
paragraphs.text: Wow, revenues really were through the roof!

paragraphs.speaker: Todd
paragraphs.text: That's great. Kudos to Linda! She deservers a pat on the back. The guerilla marketing campaign she dreamed up was brilliant. She sent out email to all of our customers asking them to e-mail a friend about our service. For each friend they e-mailed, they received a free gift.

paragraphs.speaker: Peter
paragraphs.text: Linda, your campaign helped us drum up a lot of business. We signed on 800 new customers.

paragraphs.speaker: Linda
paragraphs.text: I'm really glad my plan panned out. I thought it would, since everybody loves a freebie!
Todd: Linda, we can always count on you to think outside the box.

paragraphs.speaker: Linda:
paragraphs.text: For the record, Peter helped me come up with the idea.

paragraphs.speaker: Peter:
paragraphs.text: Thanks for sharing the credit, Linda. But it was your idea.
